biotools.summary:
A database for alternative splicing atlas in livestock animals.

The alternative splicing in livestock animals database (ASlive.org) is a collection of alternative splicing events across tissues in livestock animal speceis in including cattle (Bos taurus), sheep (Ovis aries), pigs (Sus scrofa), chickens (Gallus gallus) and horses (Equus Caballus).

bioschemas.name: ASlive
